price: Basi wote hao ndio wanao kimbilia katika mambo ya kheri, na ndio watakao tangulia kuyafikia.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ
footnotes: Hao wote hukimbilia na a'mali zao kuendea kupata kheri, na wao ni wenye kuwatangulia wengineo katika kupata huko.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ulāika yusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūna
